name: ascii-art-previewer
description: Previews ASCII art using MIRC colors.

defaultScale.title: Default Scale
defaultScale.description: Default scale factor used when generating an image (pixels per "blown-up" pixel).

enum.description: Full: Font sizes are twice the scale factor (two "blown-up" pixels tall).
Minus-half: Characters take up less room within each "blown-up" pixel.

defaultBackgroundColor.title: Default Background Color
defaultBackgroundColor.description: Characters missing from the end of lines are filled in with this color.
